title: How to Unsubscribe from Kyivstar TV
description: This guide provides several methods to cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription as of February 22, 2026. Choose the method that is most convenient for you.

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via My Kyivstar Web Portal
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription via the web portal:

*   Go to the My Kyivstar web portal (account.kyivstar.ua).
*   Log in using your phone number.
*   In the menu, select the 'Services' section.
*   Find 'Київстар ТБ' in the list of connected services.
*   Click 'Manage service' or 'Disable'.
*   Confirm the action. You will receive a notification confirming the service is deactivated.

steps_2.title: Unsubscribe via Phone (USSD Code)
steps_2.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription via USSD code:

*   Dial *700# on your phone and press the call button to access the service management menu.
*   Alternatively, dial 477*760#.
*   Follow the prompts to find and cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription.
*   Wait for an SMS confirmation of cancellation.

steps_3.title: Unsubscribe via Phone (Customer Support)
steps_3.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription by contacting customer support:

*   Call Customer Support at 466 (free within the Kyivstar network) or 0 800 300 466 (from other networks).
*   Verify your identity by providing the necessary information to the consultant.
*   Request the cancellation of the Kyivstar TV service.
*   The consultant will clarify the details and confirm the service deactivation.

steps_4.title: Unsubscribe via Google Play
steps_4.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription via Google Play:

*   Open the Google Play app.
*   Tap your profile icon.
*   Select "Payments & subscriptions" and then "Subscriptions".
*   Find Київстар ТБ in the list and tap "Cancel subscription".

steps_5.title: Unsubscribe via iOS Settings
steps_5.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription via iOS Settings:

*   Open the Settings app.
*   Tap your name at the top.
*   Select "Subscriptions" (or "Media & Purchases" if you don't see it).
*   Find Київстар ТБ and tap "Cancel Subscription".

steps_6.title: Unsubscribe via Kyivstar TV website (if paying by card)
steps_6.description:
If you pay for Kyivstar TV with a bank card, you can cancel your subscription through the Kyivstar TV website:

*   Go to tv.kyivstar.ua and log in to your profile.
*   Go to the 'My Profile' or 'Subscriptions' section.
*   Find the active package and click 'Cancel Subscription'.
